definition: to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment

sentences.english: The vehicle′s level can also be adjusted manually in two stages by pushbutton.
sentences.chinese: 汽車的水平高度也可通過按鈕分兩次手動調節。

sentences.english: The machine stops and starts at a touch.
sentences.chinese: 這臺機器一觸按鈕就可以啓動或停下。

sentences.english: If you look at this screen, there is a play button.
sentences.chinese: 如果你看到這這個屏幕，你將會發現一個播放按鈕。

sentences.english: Unsurprisingly, the product image and the bright orange buttons.
sentences.chinese: 毫無疑問，是產品圖像和淺橙色的按鈕。

sentences.english: Button on the side of the plane or edge for a smooth transition for the arc-shaped.
sentences.chinese: 按鈕的側面棱邊可爲平面或爲圓弧狀的平滑過渡。

sentences.english: Depress this button in case of fire.
sentences.chinese: 他按下按鈕開動了機器。

sentences.english: Click the forward button, located by the start button.
sentences.chinese: 單擊位於開始按鈕旁邊的前進按鈕。

sentences.english: Click the forward button, located by the start button.
sentences.chinese: 單擊位於開始按鈕旁邊的前進按鈕。

sentences.english: Enter POL in the media code box and click the Verify button.
sentences.chinese: 輸入油料在媒體上的代碼框，並點擊驗證按鈕。

sentences.english: In a table-view row, to reveal the Delete button.
sentences.chinese: 在表視圖行，以顯示刪除按鈕。

sentences.english: Plush leather, matte-finish tactile buttons: quality craftsmanship.
sentences.chinese: 舒適豪華的皮革，磨砂觸覺按鈕:高品質工藝。

sentences.english: This alarm button is only to is used in extremis.
sentences.chinese: 此警報按鈕只在緊急情況下使用。

sentences.english: You should be seeing two green round buttons for the two processes.
sentences.chinese: 在這兩個過程中應該能夠看到兩個綠色的圓形按鈕。

sentences.english: The editor contains a button that will perform the submission.
sentences.chinese: 該編輯器包含一個將執行提交的按鈕。

sentences.english: You have a few options for editing the button style.
sentences.chinese: 在編輯按鈕樣式時，有幾個選項供您選擇。

sentences.english: Wait a few minutes, and then click the Redial button.
sentences.chinese: 等待幾分鐘後單擊“重撥”按鈕。

definition: button or key (on a device)/keystroke/CL:個|个[ge4]/to press a button
power switch/gas valve/to open the city (or frontier) gate/to open and close/to switch on and off
key (on a piano or computer keyboard)/button (on a mouse or other device)/chemical bond/linchpin
to make a choice (between several alternatives)/a choice/an option/an alternative
to open/to show (a ticket)/to turn on/to switch on
to rotate (about an axis)/to revolve/to turn/to move in a circle/to gyrate
to select/(computing) to click on (one of several options)/to navigate to (a webpage)
car door/door of bus, railway carriage etc
